sentence: Florida Governor Ron DeSantis recently signed a "Stop Woke Act" to end Diversity, Equity and Inclusion (DEI) efforts in the workplace.
author: Summer Rose
title: Improve the Health of Black Women. Make Racial Trauma at Work Extinct | Opinion
